verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy,
Lord God Almighty!
Early in the morning

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
My song shall rise to Thee.
Holy, holy, holy!
Merciful and mighty!

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
God in three Persons,
Blessed Trinity!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy!
All the saints adore Thee,
Casting down their golden crowns

verse.name: v2b
v2c
verse.lines:
Which wert, and art,
And evermore shall be.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy!
Though the darkness hide Thee,
Though the eye of sinful man

verse.name: v3b
v3c
verse.lines:
Perfect in power,
In love, in purity.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy!
Lord God Almighty!
All Thy works shall praise Thy name

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
In earth, and sky, and sea.
Holy, holy, holy!
Merciful and mighty!

verse.name: v4c
verse.lines:
God in three Persons,
Blessed Trinity.
